nodes.text: Gormel Kenobi was a man briefly employed by Tatooine moisture farmer Wyle Ulbreck at some point before 19 BBY. Ulbreck became convinced Kenobi was a spice addict and a thief, and fired him — the old farmer was known for believing most people he dealt with were stealing from him. When Ben Kenobi's surname became known in the Pika Oasis, Ulbreck mentioned Gormel as a Kenobi he had once known.
